title: Can't create a lobby/game, ranked queues disabled. [30/10/2019 9:50PM]
body:
Can anyone create a game or join a lobby?

I default to the Co-op vs AI screen when I click 'PLAY' and every queue has a red exclamation mark next to it.

replies.body:
Things will hopefully be back to normal soon!

Updates from Mindstar in this thread: https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/Ntey9fRZ/d/s0vZ3I7n

You can also follow the updates through the red tracker: https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/redtracker

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
